byline.original: By MERNA THOMAS and DAVID D. KIRKPATRICK

abstract: Six bombs explode across Egypt, killing one person and wounding at least nine others; obscure group called Popular Resistance Movement claims responsibility.
lead_paragraph: A wave of explosions killed a passer-by and wounded at least nine other people early Thursday morning across the Nile from Cairo, raising alarms about a pattern of attacks by diffuse groups against retail stores.

headline.main: Obscure Group Says It Set Off Blasts in Egypt, Raising Alarm
headline.print_headline: Obscure Group Says It Set Off Blasts in Egypt, Raising Alarm

snippet: A wave of explosions killed a passer-by and wounded at least nine other people early Thursday morning across the Nile from Cairo, raising alarms about a pattern of attacks by diffuse groups against retail stores.
